Title: Crime and Punishment.

Authors: Fyodor Dostoyevsky.
Categories: Fiction.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=ROi0n7azQwUC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: Raskolnikov, a destitute and desperate former student, commits a random murder without remorse or regret, imagining himself to be a great man far above moral law. But as he embarks on a dangerous cat-and-mouse game with a suspicious police investigator, his own conscience begins to torment him and he seeks sympathy and redemption from Sonya, a downtrodden prostitute. Translated with an Introduction and Notes by David McDuff.
Published Year: 2002.
